title: Snowdown Chest Confusion...
body:
My client home page is telling me I have 2 hours remaining to buy the "Fired Up" snowdown chest and that it "Contains fire themed shards", but the store is offering the "Frozen Fiends" chest. I didn't realize this until after I made my purchase. 

PLS FIX

replies.body: Yesterday only contained the Frozen Fiends chest, so the Fired Up messaging wouldn't be accurate.  Do you have a screenshot of this and around the time it occurred?  I'd like to take a look in case this happens with other chests as well.  Hope that clears up any confusion!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rypNE4GR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-15T18:26:36.463+0000)
>
> Yesterday only contained the Frozen Fiends chest, so the Fired Up messaging wouldn't be accurate.  Do you have a screenshot of this and around the time it occurred?  I'd like to take a look in case this happens with other chests as well.  Hope that clears up any confusion!

I have one for today saying that it is the "mistletoe" chest for heart themed skins. however today is for fired up snowdown skins. I fell into the same trap though making the purchase without knowing.

http://imgur.com/a/Pm7qr

This just happened to me. 
https://i.gyazo.com/6433aaba391c93566946c4a8713adf87.png

Front page said "Space" themed skins, but I got the Mistletoe Snowdown Chest with a heart themed shard.

Day 3 for me, problem still unresolved, still have 2 ice shard chests when i wanted fire lol

And yes, my countdown today says Space, but the store has Mistletoe

I didn't take the stats with yesterday's shot, but it's still doing it like Blacktier said:

http://i.imgur.com/APKKrSq.jpg

My client shows Mistletoe counting down, but Fired Up is in the store
